pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Norman Corwin Collection: Material By and About
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of scripts, programs and clippings. Includes scripts for "The World of Carl Sandberg," "The Charter in the Saucer," "Lust for Life," and "The Golden Door." Also includes a hardbound copy of the "The Plot to Overthrow Christmas" and an acting edition of "The Rivalry."
